snippet.title: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
RISE AGAINST RUIN

A mysterious and deadly black mist is spreading from the Shadow Isles, and it’s threatening to take over all of Runeterra. Unite a party of League of Legends champions to fight back against Ruination and uncover the secrets of the mist in Ruined King: A League of Legends Story. Explore Runeterra in this immersive turn-based RPG from Airship Syndicate, now available on Nintendo Switch, Playstation, Xbox, GOG, Steam, and Epic Games. 

Stay up to date:
Twitter (@RiotForge)
Facebook (@RiotForge)
Instagram (@RiotForge)

Learn more about Airship Syndicate: http://www.airshipsyndicate.com/
Learn more about Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/

The PS4 version of Ruined King includes a free upgrade to the digital PS5 version, which will be available at a later date. The Xbox version of Ruined King uses Smart Delivery, allowing access to both the Xbox One title and the Xbox Series X|S title, which will also be available at a later date.
